snippet: In the past year, Google has been repeatedly criticized on privacy issues. That may be why the search giant seems to be having a hard time finding enough participants for an ambitious new tracking venture.
abstract: In the past year, Google has been repeatedly criticized on privacy issues. That may be why the search giant seems to be having a hard time finding enough participants for an ambitious new tracking venture.

headline.main: Data Dump: Are Potential Panelists Scorning Google?
headline.print_headline:
Google Seeks
Volunteers
For Web Tracking
